title: Tranquil Palm Cove Apartment Escape Moments From the Beach
description:
Immerse yourself in the dramatic beauty of Queensland’s Palm Cove with a stylish escape at the peaceful Sebel Palm Cove Coral Coast. Located mere moments from Palm Cove Beach, on the edge of Williams Esplanade, this tranquil tropical property will be your lavish launchpad to this unspoilt paradise, with a collection of stylish self-contained apartments offering everything you need for a private and stress-free retreat from everyday life.

Famed for its laidback coastal lifestyle, beautiful beaches and close proximity to the Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest, Palm Cove effortlessly exudes the tropical vibe that holiday dreams are made of. From the cobbled paving of the waterfront promenade and alfresco restaurants shaded by palm trees, to the to lush greenery laden with blooms everywhere you look, there is so much to fall in love with in this sophisticated beachside town. Experience it for yourself from the Sebel, one of Palm Cove’s most relaxing retreats, just a 30-minute drive from Cairns.
location_description: The Sebel Palm Cove Coral Coast
offer_address: Coral Coast Drive, Palm Cove, Queensland 4879, Australia

title: Palm Cove Family-Friendly Apartment Luxury by Lancemore with Direct Beach Access
description:
Embrace the laidback ambience of picture-perfect Palm Cove in Tropical North Queensland at the iconic Alamanda Palm Cove by Lancemore - the only property in the region to boast direct access to the beach. Perfect for couples and families, these stunning self-contained apartments invite you to experience pure barefoot luxury, with each offering floor-to-ceiling views, convenient kitchen facilities and balconies overlooking the shimmering Coral Sea or tropical gardens.

When you are ready to leave the perfect beach setting, explore Palm Cove’s famous esplanade, with its island-on-the-mainland demeanour, incredible food scene and boutique shops. When adventure calls, hire a kayak and paddle across the glassy water, visit Palm Cove jetty to spot fishermen in action, or discover the wonders of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest.
offer_address: 1 Veivers Road, Palm Cove, Queensland 4879, Australia

title: Beach Town Apartment Stay In Beautiful Palm Cove
description: Sleep with the beach just minutes away at Elysium Apartments, Palm Cove. This Tropical North Queensland beachside town is perfect for a relaxing stay, offering watersports, sunbathing and delicious dining options. Relax in your modern, self-catered apartment, with the option to upgrade to larger apartments for bigger groups. Plus, one child aged 12 and under stays free when using existing bedding.
offer_address: 26 Veivers Rd, Palm Cove QLD 4879

title: Award-Winning Adults-Only Palm Cove Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & A$300 Dining Credit
description:
Treat yourself to a slice of tropical indulgence at The Reef House, an adults-only retreat just a 25-minute drive from the centre of Cairns. Revel in a superb selection of over 21 of the resort's signature experiences and activities - find your sunrise yoga flow on the beachfront, sample the perfect pina colada at the Reef House Mixology masterclass and discover Palm Cove's local history and lore on an Indigenous cultural journey, before returning at dusk for canapes and punch in Brigadier's Bar. Here, old-world elegance, bespoke luxury and laidback beach house vibes guarantee an escape unlike any other.

Hugged by the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest on one side and turquoise waters of the Great Barrier Reef on the other, this award-winning boutique sanctuary offers spacious rooms and suites mere metres from the pristine white sands of Palm Cove Beach. Find yourself perfectly located on Williams Esplanade, among Palm Cove’s superb restaurants and retail boulevards, promising easy relaxation with a touch of tropical flair.
offer_address: 99 Williams Esplanade, Palm Cove, Queensland 4879, Australia

title: Laidback Apartment Getaway in Tropical North Queensland
description: Soak up the beautiful weather and stunning natural surroundings of Tropical North Queensland with a stay at The Reef Retreat in Palm Cove. This charming town is the ideal home base for exploring the Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest. Enjoy the freedom of a self-contained apartment stay, only moments away from the beach, and enjoy a gourmet breakfast hamper, a bottle of wine, an early check-in and late checkout and more.
offer_address: 10-14 Harpa St, Palm Cove QLD 4879

title: Serene Palm Cove Beachfront Apartment Luxury by Lancemore with Direct Beach Access
description:
Take it easy with your loved ones at this tropical gem, renowned for being the only property in Palm Cove with direct beach access. Perfectly positioned with views over Tropical North Queensland's shimmering Coral Sea, the resort offers the perfect excuse to discover the region's best, including the nearby Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest.

With convenient kitchen facilities and floor-to-ceiling views, Alamanda Palm Cove by Lancemore’s self-contained apartments are ideal for couples and families seeking an island-like retreat. When you’re no longer barefoot sun-soaking and sea-splashing, explore Palm Cove’s diverse food scene, boutique shops and lookouts dotted along the coast.

If you want to stay closer to home, treat your mind, body and soul to an ethereal escape at the L.M. Spa where the massages and facials are just as rejuvenating as the ocean next door. Round off your day at the onsite, award-winning restaurant Nu Nu for an evening of cocktails and exquisite tropical dining.
offer_address: 1 Veivers Road, Palm Cove, Queensland 4879, Australia

vendor_name: Coral Coast Resort Palm Cove Accor Vacation Club Apartments
title: Serene Palm Cove Two-Bedroom Apartment Escape for up to Four Guests
description:
If you dream of days relaxing in the shadows of towering palm trees, snorkelling past stunning coral reefs or hiking through lush rainforests, Coral Coast Resort Palm Cove, Accor Vacation Club Apartments is the perfect escape. Spectacularly located between Cairns and Port Douglas, this tropical enclave may be small and intimate, yet there is no shortage of ways for you to immerse yourself in the jaw-dropping beauty of Far North Queensland. Ideal for families or groups, each stylish self-contained apartment offers kitchen and laundry facilities, lounge and dining areas and a private balcony, while the outdoor pool is perfect for a cooling dip.

Set slightly back from the main esplanade, the resort is positioned within easy reach of Palm Cove's wealth of laidback bars, friendly cafés and boutique retail outlets. When adventure calls, hire a kayak and paddle across the glassy water, visit the Palm Cove jetty to spot fishermen in action or travel further to the Great Barrier Reef and explore vast underwater kingdoms lurking just beneath the surface.
location_description: Coral Coast Resort Palm Cove, Accor Vacation Club Apartments
offer_address: Coral Coast Drive Palm Cove QLD 4879 Australia

vendor_name: Coral Coast Resort Palm Cove Accor Vacation Club Apartments
title: Peaceful Palm Cove Family Apartments Moments from the Beach
description:
If you live in pursuit of days spent relaxing in the shadows of towering palm trees, snorkelling past stunning coral reefs or hiking through verdant rainforests, Coral Coast Resort Palm Cove, Accor Vacation Club Apartments, is the place for you. Spectacularly located between Cairns and Port Douglas, the tropical enclave of Palm Cove may be small and intimate, yet there is no shortage of ways for you to immerse yourself in the jaw-dropping beauty of Far North Queensland.

Ideal for families or groups, each stylish self-contained apartment offers full kitchen and laundry facilities, lounge and dining areas and a private balcony - made for relaxing at the end of the day with a cocktail in hand - while the sunny outdoor pool is perfect for a cooling dip. Beyond your home-away-home, Palm Cove's cafés, restaurants, bars, boutique shops and famed beach are just a short stroll away.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Pour a glass and celebrate your stay with a welcome bottle of wine
- Make the most of complimentary access to Oceans Edge Health Club
- Let your stay in paradise last that little bit longer with guaranteed 12pm late checkout

**Travelling with a larger group?** Upgrade to the spacious Three-Bedroom Apartment for up to six guests.

**Reef Cruise Upgrade:** Choose this fun family package for two adults and two children (aged 13 years and under) for an even more unforgettable experience. Embark on an incredible full-day cruise of the outer Great Barrier Reef onboard Australia’s most awarded reef cruise, Quicksilver. Spend a full day exploring the outer Great Barrier Reef, enjoy a tropical buffet lunch, learn more about the reef with the help of a marine biologist and snorkel the crystal-clear waters of Agincourt Reef. This upgrade also includes a transfer on arrival from Cairns Airport to your accommodation.
location_description: Coral Coast Resort Palm Cove, Accor Vacation Club Apartments
offer_address: Coral Coast Drive Palm Cove QLD 4879 Australia

title: Tropical Palm Cove Suite Escape
description:
Fall in love with the barefoot glamour and old-world charm of Palm Cove with a stay at the Hotel Grand Chancellor Palm Cove - set over seven acres of lush tropical gardens. Perfectly positioned in the heart of the beachside village of Palm Cove, with numerous award-winning restaurants, boutiques and spas spanning the length of its esplanade and palm tree-lined beach, the hotel's location is ideal for exploring the Great Barrier Reef or Daintree Rainforest.

Offering just the right mix of leisure activities and space to relax - including two outdoor swimming pools, massage, beauty and hair salon, games room, restaurant and bar - this is a tropical paradise you won't want to leave.

title: Palm Cove Award-Winning Boutique Beachfront Hotel
description: The Reef House is an iconic boutique hotel overlooking the Coral Sea in the tropical village of Palm Cove. Set between the lush surrounds of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest and turquoise waters of the Great Barrier Reef, this boutique hotel offers spacious rooms and suites mere metres from the beach. This couples' retreat, just 25 minutes from Cairns, offers relaxed beach house vibes and true tranquillity for the perfect tropical escape in the heart of Palm Cove. Relax in the adults-only pool, wake up with yoga, aqua aerobics and cocktail making classes or rejuvenate in the multi-awarded Reef House Day Spa. Finish your day with complimentary drinks and canapés served in the Brigadier’s lounge before dining under the stars in the awarded Reef House restaurant.

title: Award-Winning Adults-Only Palm Cove Escape Overlooking the Coral Sea
description:
If you were ever contemplating a tropical escape to soak up the tranquil atmosphere within one of Queensland’s most loved spots, look no further than The Reef House Adults Retreat, stamped with a  Travellers’ Choice Best of the Best - making it one of the top 1% of properties worldwide. Hugged by the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest on one side and turquoise waters of the Great Barrier Reef on the other, this award-winning boutique sanctuary offers spacious rooms and suites mere metres from the pristine white sands of Palm Cove Beach - and to even further sweeten the deal, it's adults only, meaning no guests under 17 are permitted.

A stay at the charming The Reef House Adults Retreat is synonymous with romanticism and sophistication, and the little touches, like the dedicated Luxury Concierge and complimentary activities, including aqua aerobics, interactive 'Reef House Mixology' class, and unlimited use of the resort’s fishing rods or vintage-style cruiser bikes set this resort apart from the rest. You won’t need to look far for gourmet bites, with the Reef House Restaurant and Brigadier’s Bar & Lounge conveniently located onsite, and the iconic Reef House Spa is the place to go for moments of uninterrupted bliss.
